sentences.sContent: When they conquered Britain, the Romans brought this custom with them.
sentences.sCn: 当古罗马人征服不列颠时，他们把这一习俗也带了过去。

sentences.sContent: ...The German traveler Johann Winckelmann pioneered the field of art history with his comprehensive study of Greek and Roman sculpture; he was portrayed by his friend Anton Raphael Mengs at the beginning of his long residence in Rome...
...I'll just go get that history paper I did last year on the Roman Empire and turn it into a first-person application essay!...

phrases.pCn: 罗马帝国（指公元前27年到公元476年的罗马奴隶制国家）
罗马天主教的；天主教会的；天主教徒
罗马天主教会；罗马公教

trans.tranOther: a citizen of ancient Rome or its empire
